trans-unit.target: 函数表达式 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档
函数表达式 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Declares the parameters and code that define a function lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 声明的参数和函数的 lambda 表达式定义的代码。
语法
部件
术语
定义
可选。

trans-unit.source: A list of local variable names that represent the parameters of this procedure.
trans-unit.target: 本地变量的名称，表示此过程的参数的列表。

trans-unit.source: The parentheses must be present even when the list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 括号必须存在，即使该列表为空。
请参阅[参数列表](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/parameter-list.md)。
必需。
单个表达式。

trans-unit.source: The type of the expression is the return type of the function.
trans-unit.target: 表达式的类型是该函数的返回类型。
必需。

trans-unit.source: A list of statements that returns a value by using the `Return` statement.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，通过使用语句的列表`Return`语句。

trans-unit.source: (See [Return Statement](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/return-statement.md).) The type of the value returned is the return type of the function.
trans-unit.target: (请参阅[Return 语句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/return-statement.md)。)返回的值的类型为该函数的返回类型。
备注

trans-unit.source: A *lambda expression* is a function without a name that calculates and returns a value.
trans-unit.target: 一个*lambda 表达式*是没有名称，用于计算并返回一个值的函数。

trans-unit.source: You can use a lambda expression anywhere you can use a delegate type, except as an argument to `RemoveHandler`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 lambda 表达式任意位置可用作委托类型，除参数`RemoveHandler`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, and the use of lambda expressions with delegates, see [Delegate Statement](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/delegate-statement.md) and [Relaxed Delegate Conversion](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/delegates/relaxed-delegate-conversion.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关委托和使用委托的 lambda 表达式的用法的详细信息，请参阅[委托语句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/delegate-statement.md)和[宽松委托转换](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/delegates/relaxed-delegate-conversion.md)。
Lambda 表达式语法

trans-unit.source: The syntax of a lambda expression resembles that of a standard function.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 表达式的语法类似于标准函数。
区别，如下所示如下︰

trans-unit.source: A lambda expression does not have a name.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 表达式不具有一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Lambda expressions cannot have modifiers, such as `Overloads` or `Overrides`.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 表达式不能具有修饰符，如`Overloads`或`Overrides`。

trans-unit.source: Lambda expressions do not use an `As` clause to designate the return type of the function.
trans-unit.target: 不使用 lambda 表达式`As`子句来指定该函数的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the type is inferred from the value that the body of a single-line lambda expression evaluates to, or the return value of a multiline lambda expression.
trans-unit.target: 相反，该类型被推断从单行 lambda 表达式的主体，计算得出的值或多行 lambda 表达式的返回值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the body of a single-line lambda expression is `Where cust.City = "London"`, its return type is `Boolean`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果单行 lambda 表达式的主体是`Where cust.City = "London"`，其返回类型是`Boolean`。

trans-unit.source: The body of a single-line lambda expression must be an expression, not a statement.
trans-unit.target: 单行 lambda 表达式的主体必须是一个表达式，而不是语句。

trans-unit.source: The body can consist of a call to a function procedure, but not a call to a sub procedure.
trans-unit.target: 主体可以包含的调用函数的过程，但未对一个 sub 过程的调用。

trans-unit.source: Either all parameters must have specified data types or all must be inferred.
trans-unit.target: 必须必须推断数据类型或所有已经指定所有参数。

trans-unit.source: Optional and Paramarray parameters are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允许使用可选和 Paramarray 参数。
不允许泛型参数。
示例

trans-unit.source: The following examples show two ways to create simple lambda expressions.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示两种方法可以创建简单的 lambda 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The first uses a `Dim` to provide a name for the function.
trans-unit.target: 第一个使用`Dim`提供该函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: To call the function, you send in a value for the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要调用函数时，您传递参数的值。
[!code-vb[VbVbalrLambdas #&1;](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/function-expression_1.vb)]
[!code-vb[VbVbalrLambdas #&2;](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/function-expression_2.vb)]
示例

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can declare and run the function at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以声明并在同一时间运行该函数。
[!code-vb[VbVbalrLambdas #&3;](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/function-expression_3.vb)]
示例

trans-unit.source: Following is an example of a lambda expression that increments its argument and returns the value.
trans-unit.target: 下面是递增其参数并返回的值的 lambda 表达式的示例。

trans-unit.source: The example shows both the single-line and multiline lambda expression syntax for a function.
trans-unit.target: 该示例同时显示的单行和多行 lambda 表达式语法的函数。
有关更多示例，请参阅[Lambda 表达式](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/lambda-expressions.md)。
[!code-vb[VbVbalrLambdas #&14;](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/function-expression_4.vb)]
示例

trans-unit.source: Lambda expressions underlie many of the query operators in [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/vbteclinqext_md.md)], and can be used explicitly in method-based queries.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 表达式是基础中的查询运算符的许多[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/vbteclinqext_md.md)]，并可以在基于方法的查询中显式使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](../../../csharp/includes/vbteclinq_md.md)] query, followed by the translation of the query into method format.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了典型[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](../../../csharp/includes/vbteclinq_md.md)]查询，然后再查询的平移到方法格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about query methods, see [Queries](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/queries.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关查询方法的详细信息，请参阅[查询](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/queries.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about standard query operators, see [Standard Query Operators Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24cda21e-8af8-4632-b519-c404a839b9b2).
trans-unit.target: 有关标准查询运算符的详细信息，请参阅[标准查询运算符概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24cda21e-8af8-4632-b519-c404a839b9b2)。
